8109.HK.summary: Kirin Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides insurance brokerage and money lending services in Hong Kong. The company operates through Insurance Brokerage and Related Service; Asset Management and Securities Brokerage Service; Money Lending Service; and Multi-Channel Network (MCN) Entertainment Business segments. It also offers advisory services, asset management services, and securities brokerage services, as well as consultancy and entertainment services. The company was formerly known as Creative Energy Solutions Holdings Limited and changed its name to Kirin Group Holdings Limited in July 2016. Kirin Group Holdings Limited is headquartered in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong.
